title: Holo Compass - Android & Wear
summary: A totally free, accurate and fully customizable compass, with no annoying ads!
description: A totally free, accurate and fully customizable compass and spirit level, with no ads, a lightening-fast start-up time and support for HD screens!Now supports Android Wear!FEATURES:• No irritating ads• Smooth and accurate compass• Digital and easy-to-use spirit level• Customise the holo theme, colors and compass style (more options coming soon)• Displays heading and direction clearly• Minimalist design is easy to use and quick to launch• Less than 4 megabytes in size• No impact on battery lifePERMISSIONS:The app needs access to your location to calculate the direction of north. Unlike most other compass apps, this one doesn't need internet access!INFO:This compass depends on your phone's sensors - it's only as good as they are!The compass (like ordinary compasses) mightn't be accurate if you try to use it near a magnet or a big chunk of metal (like a car).If you have an idea for a feature that you'd like to be added, or if you're a developer and you'd like to talk about the code, send me an email! I'll try to add a new feature each time the app moves up a download bracket.
descriptionHTML:
A totally free, accurate and fully customizable compass and spirit level, with no ads, a lightening-fast start-up time and support for HD screens!

Now supports Android Wear!

FEATURES:
• No irritating ads
• Smooth and accurate compass
• Digital and easy-to-use spirit level
• Customise the holo theme, colors and compass style (more options coming soon)
• Displays heading and direction clearly
• Minimalist design is easy to use and quick to launch
• Less than 4 megabytes in size
• No impact on battery life

PERMISSIONS:
The app needs access to your location to calculate the direction of north. Unlike most other compass apps, this one doesn't need internet access!

INFO:
This compass depends on your phone's sensors - it's only as good as they are!
The compass (like ordinary compasses) mightn't be accurate if you try to use it near a magnet or a big chunk of metal (like a car).
If you have an idea for a feature that you'd like to be added, or if you're a developer and you'd like to talk about the code, send me an email! I'll try to add a new feature each time the app moves up a download bracket.
comments: Only compass that works on Moto360 Not sure how.
Sit the 360 on the table and rotate it... north drifts 30 degrees . But do the same with the Nexus 5 and it works fine. Can't fault this app for that.
Number doesn't show on Moto 360 The number in degrees doesn't show on the Moto 360 and unfortunately it is cut off on the bottom but that's not your fault. Works great on the phone.
Great compass Really handy, looks great too!
Color customization doesn't carry over to watch
recentChanges: We've got over 1,000 downloads now, so it's time for an update! Here are the new features:
- Android Wear version now displays direction and heading
- Fixed a bug where settings would not be applied when pressing the back button on some phones
- Compass now displays true north by default
